ValidationRule.description: To create a BE Creation case with Product Type HIRE, the fields Parent Child Connection needed?, Child can access Parent Budget? and User for Recruiter Portal are mandatory. RO-1759, RO-1760
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Backend_Creation_Case", ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, "HIRE"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Parent_Child_Connection_needed__c, ""), ISPICKVAL( Child_can_access_Parent_Budget__c, "" ), ISBLANK( User_for_Recruiter_Portal__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When creating a HIRE case, make sure to fill in Parent Child Connection needed?, Child can access Parent Budget? and User for Recruiter Portal.
